summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4166 for the improvement of 6th Avenue Northwest, from West 65th Street to West 67th Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49735, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
